VirtuallyDedicated, a subsidiary of RockMyWeb, has been offering virtual servers for 5 years and cloud servers for nearly 3 years.  We have a stellar reputation, experience, and a setup that brings reliability and affordability.

We are now offering cloud servers in Chicago and Las Vegas.

**Cloud features**
=========================================


- Our cloud offers the following features:
- High availability failover and data mirroring to keep your server online in the event of hardware failures
- Load balancing to keep your server running at peak performance.
- Instant upgrades available at an hourly rate
- Automatic backups to keep your data safe from accidental deletion or data corruption.


**Go Green**
=========================================

Our cloud offers you many power saving features.  Our cloud runs at 100% efficiency as compared to the traditional cluster which only offered 50% efficiency.  Our servers run using both efficient hard drives and power supplies to reduce power usage.  When using our cloud servers over dedicated you can reduce your bill, your energy usage, and receive equivalent speeds.

Server Platforms
=========================================

We have cloud servers starting at $5.00 per month and expanding all the way up to 8GB of RAM.

We have four specific platforms that can assist you depending on your needs. 

**Value**: Our value platform is an affordable solution that offers all the features needed to run a successful web site or service.
**Application**: Our application platform offers more guaranteed CPU and swap space to help handle heavy applications like database hosting, game servers, and java.
**Bandwidth**: Our bandwidth servers are for users who need to transfer a lot of data.  This can be great for streaming, file hosting, and more.  Transfer up to 50TB per month.
**Storage**: Our storage servers are great for VPS users who need to store backups or files.  These include less CPU and RAM but more hard drive space.

View all of our packages today at http://www.virtuallydedicated.com
